name: Overshot
description:
PLAY IT FULLSCREEN
___________________________STORY___________________________

The dude who made your metal armor was a noob programmer. 

Your armor has an huge bug. You can only breath when you shoot.  

 

___________________________CONTROLS___________________________

MOVE: AWSD or Arrow 

SHOOT: Left mouse button

RESTART: R

PRAY: Won´t help you

___________________________OBJECTIVE___________________________

If you stop shooting you die. 

If you get hit by your own bullet you die.

If(5>4) {
Debug.Log("you die")
}

Find the exit and you will live. 

___________________________THE TEAM___________________________

Ernani Rocha - Game Designer / Programmer
@playturtlejuice

PsY SurF - Music 

https://soundcloud.com/psysurf

Helped me a lot: Doug Oliveira and Will Fernandes.  <3 Thanks guys for the final minute help.
